name: Dungeon Disaster!
description:
Dungeon Disaster!

Dungeon Disaster is a game in which you play as a healer trying manically to heal your allys and protect them from many enemies whilst also defeating them.

You can use both your attack and healing abilities to manage your team and the enemies to your advantage.

But watch out! These enemies aren't like your usual foes! Every enemy in this game absorbs the damage it takes and just like Newtons Third Law "Every action has an equal and opposite reaction." they explode the bullets back at you on death!

The tricky thing will be managing who you heal, when you heal, and do you want to heal enemies so you have more healing bullets on screen? Who knows! Give it a play now!

Controls

WASD To move

Left Click to Shoot Bullets that hurt enemies

Right Click to heal your allies and enemies

Left Shift to see your hitbox and lower your speed

Credits (In Order of Name) -
